element.definition: The type of the object that was involved in this audit event.
element.comment: This value is distinct from the user's role or any user relationship to the entity.
element.requirements: To describe the object being acted upon. In addition to queries on the subject of the action in an auditable event, it is also important to be able to query on the object type for the action.

binding.description: Code for the entity type involved in the audit event
